attributes.action: Refuse to cap or restrict the top speed of motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers propose to restrict the top speed of motorcycles for road safety reasons. As I have never seen a motorcycle crash at high speed of its own accord I would suggest that better and more comprehensive training may do better as would raising the age at which large capacity motorcycles can be ridden. There must be other ways than to infringe on my liberty yet again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
